main.title: TT_PoP Miner
AddBtc_label_message1: TT_PoP mining requires a small amount of BTC for the TX fee.
AddBtc_label_message2: TT_Please deposit minimal amounts of BTC sufficient for mining.
AddBtc_label_message3: TT_It may take 10-60 minutes for any BTC you transfer to show up here.
AutoMine_dialog_unlock_prompt: TT_AutoMining requires the wallet password such that it can be unlocked when needed
AutoMine_label_message1: TT_The PoP Miner can be set to automatically mine on every new block.
AutoMine_label_message2: TT_There are 4 types of rounds. This pattern repeats every 20 blocks. Round 4 is a 'keystone', which gives a higher reward.
AutoMine_hlnk_help: TT_Click here to see more about different rounds
AutoMine_label_selectRounds: TT_Please select which ones you would like to mine:
AutoMine_label_summaryAmount_some: TT_This will try to AutoMine %1$s out of every 20 blocks
AutoMine_label_summaryAmount_all: TT_This will try to AutoMine every single block
AutoMine_label_warningContinue: TT_WARNING: This will continue to mine as long as the the PoP Service CLI is running... even if the GUI is shut down.
AutoMine_save_error:
TT_There was an error saving automine rounds.
Please try again, or check the PoP Miner logs.
Some rounds may have still been saved.
ConnectPoP_label_message1: TT_The PoP Service is a separate application that must run in order to PoP mine.
ConnectPoP_label_message2: TT_Please start this process. It will run in a new window.
ConnectPoP_status_started: TT_Started PoP miner, wait for it to load...
ConnectPoP_pickfolder_1: TT_Pick the 'bin' folder containing the nodecore-pop startup scripts
ConnectPoP_pickfolder_none: TT_No folder selected, did not start the pop miner
ConnectPoP_pickfolder_successStart: TT_Successfully started the NodeCore PoP Miner from location: %1$s
ConnectPoP_pickfolder_cancel: TT_Action cancelled - did not select a PoP Service folder. PoP Service not running
ConnectPoP_warning_shouldBeDone: TT_The PoP Service should have been ready by now. Please check the PoP Service directly.
ConnectPoP_firsttime_header:
TT_This looks like the first time the PoP Miner is running.
It creates a new Bitcoin wallet with these recovery seed words. This will only be shown once.
Please save these secret words to a safe place
ConnectPoP_firsttime_prompt: TT_This looks like the first time the PoP Miner is running.
ConnectPoP_loading: TT_PoP Service not yet ready, please wait while it loads up (This window should close automatically). [%1$s]
OperationDetail_hlnk_vbk_tooltip: TT_View VBK Transaction in web explorer
OperationDetail_hlnk_btc_tooltip: TT_View BTC Transaction in blockchain web explorer
TabPoP_mineBlock_validation1: TT_Block %1$s is %2$s blocks ago, which is past the threhold of %3$s blocks. Please try to mine a more recent block.
TabPoP_specificBlock_tooltip: TT_Clear specific block to mine; System will choose which block.
TabPoP_vbkAddress_tooltip: TT_View Address in Web Block Explorer
TabPoP_button_AddBtc_tooltip: TT_Open block explorer to add to the BTC PoP wallet address
TabPoP_autoMineSetup_noChange: TT_Nothing changed with AutoMining, user action cancelled
TabPoP_label_rewardSummary: TT_Total projected reward is %1$s %2$s, from %3$s endorsement(s), over last %4$s blocks
TabPoP_updateConfig_header: TT_Update %1$s. This impacts how much BTC you pay to mine PoP.
TabPoP_updateConfig_error: TT_A '%1$s' of %2$s BTC is too high, nothing will be sent.
TabPoP_updateConfig_warning: TT_A '%1$s' of %2$s BTC is very high, are you sure you want that?
TabPoP_button_AddBtc_notReady: TT_BTC Address not loaded yet - no action taken
TabPoP_button_AddBtc_empty: TT_BTC Wallet is empty. Mining requires paying BTC pop fees. Please add more BTC to your BTC wallet.
TabPoP_mine_waitNSeconds: TT_Must wait wait least %1$s seconds between mining
TabPoP_mine_error: TT_Please try again. If the problem persists, check the PoP Service logs.
TabPoP_mine_didNotWork: TT_The mining operation did not work: %2$s
TabPoP_mine_Success: TT_Mining operation successfully started: %1$s. Please wait a few seconds before mining again.
TabPoP_connect_header: TT_Please start and configure the PoP Service
TabPoP_connect_clickButton: TT_Please click 'Connect to PoP Service' in order to PoP Mine
TabPoP_connect_error: TT_Could not connect to PoP Service: %1$s
TabPoP_connect_success: TT_PoP Service successfully running... ready to PoP!
TabPoP_connect_alreadyDone: TT_PoP Service already running... ready to PoP!
TabPoP_button_mine_valid_addbtc: TT_Must add BTC to your balance in order to mine
TabPoP_button_mine_valid_waitN: TT_Must wait wait least %1$s seconds between mining
TabPoP_fee_summary: TT_Current: BTC fee per KB: %1$s / BTC fee max: %2$s
TabPoP_connect_popVersion: TT_Please upgrade the PoP Service to at least version %1$s
TabPoP_connect_onlyOne: TT_There should be only one instance of the PoP Service running on this machine.
